Service Details: - Offers specialized residential care that provides an alternate living environment for persons with developmental disabilities- Provides 24-hour care to individuals with disabilities who are unable to live on their own- Provides assistance with errands, meals, and other daily activities
How to Apply: - Referral required from Community Living BC with psychological assessment for eligibility- Requests for service must be made by client or family
Address & Map: 1733 Highland Dr NKelowna, BC     V1Y 4K9View MapQuest Map
Major Intersection: Highland Dr N and Little Ave
